reviews.text: First, you better speak spanish, because NO ONE speaks one word of english or french or any other languages, its unbelievable, because Palenque is a touristic destination only and you expect at least some level of professionalism when you checkin.

description: The Hotel Ciudad Real Palenque is a link in one of the most successful and youngest hotels chains of Chiapas, with an impressive architectural appearance and service which is right up there with the best on offer in any of Mexicos’s resorts and which is making a strong claim to be the perfect refuge with in the Mayan World.Located only 10 minutes from the archeological zone, 3 from the airport and 5 from the downtown, it really is sited in the strategic center of things. It also has a special infrastructure in place specially designed for groups: a special bus ramp, comfortable check-in area and efficient baggage handling services. Set among magnificent gardens, its Mexican-Caribbean architecture houses 66 rooms, 3 junior suites an 3 master suites; all of which are equipped with air conditioning, cable T.V. and telephone. There is also a Palapa-Restaurant where you can enjoy the best Chiapanecan, Mexican and International cuisine and if after visiting the archeological sites and natural wonders in the surrounding areas of Palenque It’s a rest you need; there’s nothing better than our gorgeous swimming pool to really pamper you.Our meeting and banquet room La Ceiba offers the most advanced facilities for your gathering needs. Its architecture was carefully designed to preserve the Mexican – Caribean style of the hotel and to give the most advanced space for meetings and banquets. The room can be divided in thee smaller rooms with mobile walls.
